    • Method Detail

      • withConfigResolver

        public EnvironmentFactoryBuilder withConfigResolver(EnvironmentConfigResolver configResolver)
        Use custom config resolver. Only one of withConfigResolver(EnvironmentConfigResolver), withStaticConfig(Config) and withClassLoader(ClassLoader) can be used per builder.
        Parameters:
        configResolver - The config resolver to use.

      • withStaticConfig

        public EnvironmentFactoryBuilder withStaticConfig(com.typesafe.config.Config configNode)
        Statically inject a config object into the environment. Only one of withConfigResolver(EnvironmentConfigResolver), withStaticConfig(Config) and withClassLoader(ClassLoader) can be used per builder.
        Parameters:
        configNode - The config object to use.

      • withClassLoader

        public EnvironmentFactoryBuilder withClassLoader(ClassLoader classLoader)
        Lazily load configuration from this classloader. Only one of withConfigResolver(EnvironmentConfigResolver), withStaticConfig(Config) and withClassLoader(ClassLoader) can be used per builder.
        Parameters:
        classLoader - The class loader to lazily load configuration from.
